Healthcare Dashboard Redesign

Vue.js TypeScript GraphQL Figma
Role
Engineering Manager
Outcomes
Reduced time-to-insight by 35%, achieved 4.8/5 user satisfaction score, cut support tickets by 60%.
As Engineering Manager, I led a cross-functional team to reimagine how clinicians interact with patient data. The project involved extensive user research and iterative prototyping. ## Team Leadership I managed a team of 5 engineers and collaborated closely with UX designers and product managers to deliver the redesign in 4 sprints. ## Impact The new dashboard significantly improved clinical workflows and received overwhelmingly positive feedback from users.
